channel.title: typography on Tiffany Lo
channel.description: Recent content in typography on Tiffany Lo

item.title: Archer
item.description: A type specimen to feature Archer’s versatility as a modern, savvy, and approachable typeface. Slab serif fonts aren’t typically go-to options for designers, but this exploration of Archeras body text, title text, and decorative elements demonstrates all of its potential.
